bug.author: MichaelCong
bug.description: I find that you have made many improvements to the original code. What are the main reasons for these improvements? For example: delete similar layer modules. add_module ('upsample_% d'% i, upsample) The empty layer was removed. For i, mdef in enumerate (module_defs): I is not used here either.

comments.comment: Reasons are speed, accuracy and readability/ use ability improvements. Ah good catch on the unneeded variable. Can you submit a PR for your proposed change?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/MichaelCong>@MichaelCong</denchmark-link> suggested change implemented in latest commit.
